content: 8-8 sts -2- you have to decrease your newly picked up sts on the side needles after and before the instep work in the round and make two decreases in each round until you have your original number of stitches left leaning decreases ssk right leaning decreases k2 decrease continue knitting the sock until it is ready to start the toes you made 15 rounds for the cuff knit 13 more rounds for the foot toe divide your sts evenly in a half 18-18 and start decreasing the toe decrease 4 sts in each decreasing row the pattern is always the same first st k1 then ssk left leaning decrease knit across until 3 st before the end of this side k2 decrease right leaning decrease k1 this is what you repeat on the sole too need more help → https //youtu be/pku6evzehaq decrease 4 sts in the first round knit without decreasing in the second round then decrease in each row until you have 8 sts left transfer your sts onto two double pointed needles 4-4 sts graft the toe with kitchener stitch video → https //youtu be/ffj8et-tr74 this pattern is copyright © 2024 by sockisticated for personal use only all rights reserved -3-
